glosses: A well known game in Turkey. Literal translation is "beauty or ugliness?".

examples.text: One child called "Ebe" closes his/her eyes and the others say "Güzellik mi, çirkinlik mi, havuz başında heykellik mi?" ("Beauty, Ugliness or being a statue near a pool?"). And sometimes more than it. "Ebe" chooses one of them, and the other children try to seem like beautiful, ugly, a statue near a pool etc.
